channel.title: Daniel`s Blog
channel.description: Hey, im Daniel. Welcome to my personal website currently hosted at github-pages. A lot of the content on this page is only for testing purposes and partly or fully ai generated. I plan on expanding this site to be a proper portfolio in the future.

item.title: Collection of Project Ideas
item.description: Some project ideas that I do not want to forget

item.title: How a Small Image Placeholder Change Increased Painting Time by Nearly 50%
item.description: Recently, one of our Android app developers flagged an unusual issue...
